description: vol. 2 (waqf - end). ff. 206. 220 x 160; 160 x 110 mm. 25 lin. Ṣafar 1204. Commentary on Manṣūr ibn Yūnus al-Buhūtīʼs Dalīl al-ṭālib li-nayl al-maṭālib (cf. Brockelmann, GAL, II, 424, D 2) completed in Ramaḍān 1178. Incip. (kitāb al-waqf): ... الوقف مصدر وقف الشىء اى حبسه
author: Maqdisī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad, 18th cent
creator: Maqdisī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad, 18th cent
subject: Buhūtī, Manṣūr ibn Yūnus, d. 1641—Dalīl al-ṭālib li-nayl al-maṭālib
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
